title: Watercolor demo highlights fall Hudson Society of Artist's meeting
content:
The Hudson Society of Artist's first fall meeting is Sept. 21 at 7:30 p.m. Bob Moyer will give a watercolor figure painting demonstration. Moyer is a watercolor teacher and gives workshops for the Cliffside Artists Collaborative. 
 
Meetings are at the Barlow Community Center, 41 Oviatt St. in Hudson on the first and third Mondays of the month at 7:30 p.m. Visitors are always welcome and single and family memberships are now being accepted.
